snippet: Analysts and shareholders are eager to see whether Marissa Mayer can lure back advertisers, reinvigorate a muddled brand and improve morale.
abstract: Marissa Mayer faces challenges as Yahoo's new chief executive, with analysts and shareholders eager to see if she can lure back advertisers, boost a muddled brand and improve company morale; Yahoo reports second quarter earnings that beat analysts' expectations, but revenue was was flat at $1.22 billion; net income for the second quarter fell 4.2 percent from a year earlier, to $228.5 million, or 18 cents a share.

byline.original: By NICOLE PERLROTH and TANZINA VEGA
byline.contributor: Nicole Perlroth reported from San Francisco and Tanzina Vega from New York.

lead_paragraph: Analysts and shareholders are eager to see whether Marissa Mayer can lure back advertisers, reinvigorate a muddled brand and improve morale.

headline.seo: Yahoo Quarterly Results Show Challenge Mayer Faces
headline.main: Yahoo Data Shows Depth of Challenge Mayer Faces
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Data Shows Depth Of Challenge Mayer Faces
